section.p: This class contains attributes and associations related to the storage of the image like file reference and extension, name of the host locstion etc.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateSaved with data type Point In Time
Date and time that the file was copied to the network location.

Contains exactly one [1..1] fileExtension with data type String
Extension of the file that was successfully copied to the network location.

Contains exactly one [1..1] fileName with data type String
The unique image filename of the image stored on the Vista Imaging file servers.

Contains exactly one [1..1] filePath with data type String
The location at which the file is stored. Can be a URI.

Contains exactly one [1..1] storageMediaType with data type Code
Indicates the kind of storage media upon which the file is stored, such as magnetic, worm, jukebox, etc. This is needed in order to determine what functions are necessary to access the file, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateSaved with data type Point In Time
Date and time that the file was copied to the network location.

Extension of the file that was successfully copied to the network location.

The unique image filename of the image stored on the Vista Imaging file servers.

Contains exactly one [1..1] filePath with data type String
The location at which the file is stored. Can be a URI.

Contains exactly one [1..1] storageMediaType with data type Code
Indicates the kind of storage media upon which the file is stored, such as magnetic, worm, jukebox, etc. This is needed in order to determine what functions are necessary to access the file, etc.
